description:
Seeing an error on the xenapi compute driver where one of the arguments passed in is an i18n string and can't be marshalled via xmlrpclib when talking to xenapi:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/494702/

My understanding is custom objects are not supported per:

"ServerProxy instance methods take Python basic types and objects as arguments and return Python basic types and classes."

https://docs.python.org/2.7/library/xmlrpclib.html#module-xmlrpclib
title: xenapi xmlrpclib marshalling error

comments.content:
Seeing an error on the xenapi compute driver where one of the arguments passed in is an i18n string and can't be marshalled via xmlrpclib when talking to xenapi:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/494702/

My understanding is custom objects are not supported per:

"ServerProxy instance methods take Python basic types and objects as arguments and return Python basic types and classes."

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/307984
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/307984
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=fd9bedb7a907dece1b4114be782e6baa89182f42
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit fd9bedb7a907dece1b4114be782e6baa89182f42
Author: Brian Elliott <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Apr 19 18:33:03 2016 +0000

    xenapi: Fix xmlrpclib marshalling error
    
    Fix an error that occurs when trying to marshal an
    oslo_i18n._message.Message object via xmlrpclib.
    
    xmlrpclib is not designed to marshal custom objects.  Since
    nova_version is only used for this one purpose, don't internationalize
    it.
    
    Closes-Bug: 1572264
    
    Change-Id: I04c59993125834fc50abd0c5b6dc3fd0269b7243
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
